website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek an authentic "fling" knife throwing experience, this set of 3 blades has good heft and balance.
pros: Wide stainless steel 2.8" blades, spear-point design
cons: Does not stick well in wooden targets
Handle breakage is a common complaint

customer_reviews.title: One of the knives broke
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointed. Was very excited when I received these knives,as I have other sog knives and have been highly satisfied. However, after just one day, one of the knives completely broke in half. This was a gift for my boyfriend that is now ruined and unusable. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy set of throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: SOG blades are big hunks of steel with serious weight behind them. These are only sharp on the point, the edges are not sharp. The blade profiles are more like a tomahawk with their width and weight. Excellent balance and they throw really well. I was skeptical about the nylon cord wrapped around them but it doesn't seem to impact my throw. If you want to throw something heavy with a lot of impact and penetration, these are a good value for the money. Solid, sturdy enough to withstand the newbie mistakes, and with more heft than many blades being sold....I enjoy tossing these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sollenberger

customer_reviews.title: ... be warned they do not stick into things very good because they have such a wide blade
customer_reviews.text: these things are solid but be warned they do not stick into things very good because they have such a wide blade. a body might be a different story but to get them to stick in wood you better have the arm of a professional baseball player
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, well balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. We bought several different companies throwing knifes and these are the most solid. One of the other similarly priced major brands we lost 2 tips throwing in cold weather. Not the SOGs, they still look new and throw very well. The only negative is the paracord is not going to last past the point where you become a consistent thrower, so you might as well just take it off and learn to throw without it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Queenan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After cutting off the ends of the strings, they worked well as throwing knives.
customer_reviews.author: C Howard

customer_reviews.title: they stick well and they work nice.
customer_reviews.text: First thing you gotta do: take the paracord off. That way you can throw them from the handle as well as the tip. Otherwise, they stick well and they work nice.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: they’re ok...
customer_reviews.text: they’re decent I guess. I have a couple problems with them though. First is the paracord wrapping. It looks cool but, it’s horrible to have on a throwing knife. Most ways require the knife to be able to slide out of your hand and the paracord crates drag and makes it way more difficult. Second is they’re extremely wide, if your new to throwing, it’s really hard to practice technique because it’s so much harder to stick these unless your using 50% or more throwing power. Other than that they are pretty good. I like the heft they have, they feel solid and you can really put some power behind them when you throw.
customer_reviews.author: JustinA

customer_reviews.title: These are so awesome! They look great and are such amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother in law and holy cow! These are so awesome! They look great and are such amazing quality! I can’t wait to give these to him for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: great balance
customer_reviews.text: Lots of knives are made during what I like to call days of the weeks, you can get one made on Friday that is not worth the metal it was made with due to who ever made it had Friday and the weekend on his/her mind or you get one made on Monday that is just what you wanted. Mine were all made on Monday!!!
customer_reviews.author: messiahx4ever

customer_reviews.title: I like these very much and will probably buy another set
customer_reviews.text: they are hard to stick in wood but I throw hard. They have held up without bending, or breaking the tips. I like these very much and will probably buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Bludog

customer_reviews.title: nice weight
customer_reviews.text: Really like these throwers. Really don't like that the paracord since it grabs when your trying to release. I cut the cord (ha ha?) and now it snags my finger when throwing. Don't get me wrong, I would buy them again. They stick very well with a satisfying "thunk". The blades are heavier than average, which I like. You should buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Survival Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Not Sharp. >:|
customer_reviews.text: They came in the same quality as pictured, but were NOT sharp. I got them mostly for display / cosplay purposes, so I'm not that peeved, and they are a good value, but out of the box they are not sharp enough, imho, to stick to most targets. manufacturer should correct this. :|
customer_reviews.author: W Fox

customer_reviews.title: These knives are great!
customer_reviews.text: Being retired from the military I am very familiar with the SOG brand and the quality & reliability of their products but I was still surprised at how great these “Fling” throwing knives are for the price that you pay. Ive bought other throwing knives that were more expensive but of lesser quality. I’m definitely going to by 1 or 2 more sets of these. -Robert Thomas USA-Retired
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Used them yesterday, worked pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I probably threw these about 30 times each yesterday, hit a couple, missed most because I am a noob, but despite all the misses and odd angled hits mine never broke like some other people are reporting. I feel like the extra thread should affect the spinning and throwing but it seems light enough that it doesn't cause a problem. They seem solid and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my partner. He loves them! They are a good weight, well-balanced, and stick well. The only complaint is that the cord wrapped around the handle starts to wear fairly quickly. He's had them for over a year now, though, and they have held up well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: they were packaged nicely and weren't scratched or nicked in any way
customer_reviews.text: they were packaged nicely and weren't scratched or nicked in any way. When i got them out of the box my first impression was that they feel solid like really solid the paracord wrap was really tight and was in no danger of falling off. after about 200 throws they have not yet broken they are very sturdy and feel great they are heavy enough to throw from long distances
customer_reviews.author: another dude on amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not worthless if you have a grinder they can be great blades.
customer_reviews.text: The paracord falls off right away. The tip isnt sharp enough to stick very good. Weight is good. Took off the paracord and took the blades to the grinder...after a few minutes of reshaping the blade and sharpening they work great. Wish they would come with a sharper tip.
customer_reviews.author: its me

customer_reviews.title: Feel very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The 4 stars are due to the fact that I haven't had the time to throw. I will say these knives feel very sturdy. The carrying case is nice. I am thinking the cord wrap will be removed but again I have not thrown these yet.
customer_reviews.author: gsr

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome, bad paracord
customer_reviews.text: These are generally pretty nice SOG knives. The knives are well balanced and a good size for beginners. My only problem is that the paracord ripped and came off two of the knives after about 30 mins of use. Also, the camo pattern on the paracord makes them hard to find if you are outside and do a bad throw. 4/5 mostly awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Good Thrower
customer_reviews.text: These are good solid knives. They stick well and go deep. The tail of the handle wrap tends to throw off the trajectory if it slaps your hand, but that can be cut off or the knife can be thrown by the blade. Overall, good, big solid knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: SOG! I absolutely LOVE these knives. To be able to throw as hard as I can and not have to worry if the knife will hold up is huge. With some weight behind these knives, they stick great and really can cause.some damage. I liked them so much I bough another set. Awesome product, and for the money, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paracord May Come unraveled
customer_reviews.text: These are certainly one of the coolest throwing knives I've ever had.. I have roughly eighteen different sets of knives for throwing.. including hatchets and kunai.. these are sweet for advanced throwers and they work great with half spin or no spin throws.. first try with these and stuck all three..
customer_reviews.author: Shummy

customer_reviews.title: Great Knives!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these knives 1.5 months ago and I had to come back and write this review. I've tried other knives and these knives are my favorite. The length, weight, and balance of the are perfect. I like the amount of pressure applied once it sticks to my wooden target. I've thrown these knives at least 1,000 times and because of that, there was normal wear and tear in which I had to replace the paracord handle but that's not a knock on the quality of this product... like I said, it was normal wear and tear. Great knives and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Plana

customer_reviews.title: Nice throwers.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I received these. Very good quality and a real value. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mark wanamaker

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The point is not pointed enough to stick in harder wood. I took off the paracord wrap due to the knot at the end caught my fingers when throwing. Good starter knife though.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: just what I like, lightweight is garbage to me
customer_reviews.text: These things are massive, heavy, just what I like, lightweight is garbage to me...
customer_reviews.author: Blackfox

customer_reviews.title: Solid but dull.
customer_reviews.text: Very dull. Anything other than a PERFECT, tip-first strike and these are on the ground. They are definitely not suitable for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Terd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: my favorite  in the whole market !!!!
customer_reviews.text: these are very well made, and love the sheath to hold them in...
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Schwartz / UPSIDE

customer_reviews.title: Stab in the dark... WIN!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality steel and workmanship. However the handle material (rope) did come undone somewhat fast and was not the easiest to curb the unravel.
customer_reviews.author: igotitproductions

customer_reviews.title: Great Throwing
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend LOVES these knives for target throwing. Great weight balance and the paracord gives it a good grip. Weight distribution is good too.
customer_reviews.author: KateyCT

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprises when I received these throwing knives. I’ve purchased others to in the past that wasn’t half the quality at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: CJLevesque

customer_reviews.title: Very nice....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice steel, well wrapped grips, and they throw straight as an arrow. Bang for your buck, a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent blade, but the wrap unravels quickly. So to remedy that I retied it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kailoha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful throwing knives!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are heavy weight and quality made. They are great to throw and hit the target with command. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Terry O. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I just recently got into throwing and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I just recently got into throwing and these are great for no-spin throws. You really have to put some force behind them to drive the wide point into the target, but that only serves to help you increase your range. The sheath is decent too. Really helps if you have a lot a knives to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: laxtwentyone

customer_reviews.title: Fun Throwing knife
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to throw. Well balanced and durable. The points are still sharp after many throws and misses.
customer_reviews.author: weld-it-all

customer_reviews.title: Take off the paracord wrap and these are some fantastic little throwers
customer_reviews.text: Take off the paracord wrap and these are some fantastic little throwers. With the paracord on they fly erratically, but with it removed they fly real nice and predictable. Nice heft to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: So far a very good set, well balanced and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hensley

customer_reviews.title: bigger than i thought
customer_reviews.text: solid throwing knives. Happy with the feel and balance, looking forward to throwing them. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Blade is garbage and only comes with the tiniest of points. While they look cool the knives will not hold up. The knives will stick for the first couple of throws and then after that you can basically throw them away. Unless you have a real nice grinding stone and know how to make a edge that will last then do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband - he loved them! Great quality and weight. A little bigger than expected. Very glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy some without string
customer_reviews.text: Do okay I would rather bought a solid handle but I was drinking at the time of ordering
customer_reviews.author: just a vapor

customer_reviews.title: Throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: The product exceeded my expectations. The knives were sharp and beautifully balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My son loves them. Very strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great throwing knives!
customer_reviews.text: Great throwing knives! With a bit of experimenting I found they stick really well for me at 8 to 9 feet away, while gripping the handle, and the SOG letters facing away from me. Plus, they really sink into the spruce log ends from the picture but also have stuck into the douglas fir planks too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dally

customer_reviews.title: Nice knives
customer_reviews.text: We bought these knives for our grandson for his birthday. He is having a great time learning how to throw them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Competition knives
customer_reviews.text: Quality made knives excited for what I want to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: DebraJ Anania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knives for a beginner, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've been having lots of fun with these knives. They feel solid. For the price, I would say they are a perfect set of throwing knives for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Good throwing knifes
customer_reviews.text: Feel great in your hands thick and can take a beating
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You won't be let down by this product and for the price who is even trying to compete?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this product. Exactly what I wanted and for the money it definitely delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced
customer_reviews.text: Best set of throwing knives ever bought. Great value the weight was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Todd Genovese

customer_reviews.title: Best ever set of throwing knives I've had
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit in my hand. Easy to throw. Very precise and accurate
customer_reviews.author: SLAV M TOSHKOV

customer_reviews.title: Paracord, durability, beginners
customer_reviews.text: Chipped on the first throw, dosen't always stick on contact, could have to do with the thickness of the tips, get rid of the paracord unless you plan on shredding it with consistent throws, fun for beginning I guess
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Reputable product
customer_reviews.text: A little on the pricey side but well worth it. These are a very solid product and fun to throw.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sims

customer_reviews.title: More then expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my brother in law. They look great and are a lot bigger then expected. As a gift I haven't opened the package. Shipped fast. Look great. Hopefully live up to the SOG name.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: SOG throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: Easy to throw, comfortable in hand. Durable. Para cord is comfortable for griping knife. But breaks of easy.
customer_reviews.author: Diego  Martins

customer_reviews.title: She thiccc
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected very thick, well weighted, and easy to throw.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you SOG
customer_reviews.text: Great knives, if you’re breaking them it’s because you think force is what gets the knife to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Davidson Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Not sharpened
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good handle but blades are not sharp and very thick on the edges not making for good penetration on wood targets
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Target is wood and overshot knives hit grass; 1 of 3 broke after only about 3 weeks of use. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Sue Q.

customer_reviews.title: not bad for production throwing knives
customer_reviews.text: not bad for production throwing knives. better than SOG's other throwers, but still too short. and these are way too clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bates

customer_reviews.title: Opinion is still being formed..
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough, a bit light. I found these to be a little bit squirrely and it is taking a bit to find my sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: DR-

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple days
customer_reviews.text: When they first arrived they were heavy and seem sturdy. After a couple days one broke while wife was using. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: D/SHAW11
customer_reviews.text: Knifes look to be good quality and very well made and the sheath is heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: D/SHAW11

customer_reviews.title: but I like the feel and weight of these
customer_reviews.text: I'm still quite new to this hobby, but I like the feel and weight of these. Lots of fun, and they look cool, too!
customer_reviews.author: The Kid

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer and more solid than I expected. Bought for a gift and they were well received.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: A very well made and rugged set of knives that should last indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMe

customer_reviews.title: Best knives for the money, period!
customer_reviews.text: Best knives for the money you can buy. Heavy, but not too heavy, and balanced well. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Basham

customer_reviews.title: A bit Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Product was ok quality, just really heavy and difficult to throw.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Knifes bigger & heavier than I thought they would be
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of knives And easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Cord of course comes off but tip broke and didn't stick easy
customer_reviews.author: Spang87

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: the wide head takes a more direct shot then some but i would buy again
customer_reviews.author: april oconnor

customer_reviews.title: And easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Never thrown knives before... These things are sick!!! And easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOG Never disappoints, has provided long hours of entertainment for a couple of us deployed to Afghanistan
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: big kid toy
customer_reviews.text: These are toys for big kids and by big kid I mean my 26 year old fiance was outside being a ninja and about pooped himself when he opened the box and saw that I had gotten thEm. He loves them. Thank you alot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: well made with a sheath that looks like can handle the blades over time
customer_reviews.author: jda

customer_reviews.title: great quality but could have been sharper out the
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I've come to expect from sog, great quality but could have been sharper out the box
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: great deal on three knives
customer_reviews.text: well made throwing knives. I also own their hatchets. Only complaint is the string. Wish it ended at the base and didn't come out as a loose strand through the top hole. I removed the string on one of the knives since it got wet and muddy with a bad toss and it seems to throw more consistently than the other two. Will probably wrap with hockey tape for a better grip later. The knives and well made and the steel is solid and nice sharp point. Great knives for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MD in NC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not super easy to throw, but with a little practice should be pretty easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Gavyn Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the knives
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the knives. Got here earlier than said, so bonus for us. I love SOG and will continue to buy your products.
customer_reviews.author: Juanett Brownlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his knife. He carries it everywhere and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Tylenda

customer_reviews.title: Great knives.
customer_reviews.text: A great set of throwing knifes for the money. Get rid of the paracord wrapping because the wrap and the knot interferes with the release of the knife to stick it in the target.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Well made. Had to trim off the tails but throw great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vondrasek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of disappointed, The point on my knives aren't even on center, as well as after two sessions of throwing the handle has managed to crack. Should I return the product or get an exchange, I don't even know. I suppose I'll just have to call SOG.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced and fun to throw
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced and fun to throw. Great knives for the money. Paracord will come undone eventually. I put a drop of super glue on the knot and have not had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: ben hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: You throw them and they stick in anything you throw them at. Good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first time using them, they snap right at the head of the knife
customer_reviews.author: Joejoe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 1st set of throwing knives. I don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: These knives are only sharp on the very tip. ...
customer_reviews.text: These knives are only sharp on the very tip. That may be normal but they are much more difficult to stick than throwing hatchets.
customer_reviews.author: mrs2tone

customer_reviews.title: Solid beginer knife
customer_reviews.text: Has a good feel and is easy to learn. Beware of throwing one knife onto another, the edge will be bent significantly. After a few hundred throws, fingernail shaped bends litter my blades
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved grip
customer_reviews.text: The paracord knots seemed to get in the way so I undid them and then ran a piece down the center on both sides. I lifted them up and then ran a bead of gel superglue down the center and and laid the cord back down, once dry I trimmed excess off with a razor blade and melted the ends with a soldering iron. Made the grip even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W Shirk

customer_reviews.title: No finesse
customer_reviews.text: Honesty too thick and not sharp enough to stick well. Had to sharpen when they arrived and dulled out quickly. Blade angle is not well suited for throwing. I have small hands, so if you do too, keep in mind these are quite bulky and large. No finesse.
customer_reviews.author: stella e.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality knives.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice knives. You can buy one of these knives without the holder for 37 + dollars or you can buy these three or less than 25! Which would you choose? They are really well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: DMF

customer_reviews.title: Knives and tools
customer_reviews.text: This SOG Specially throwing knife was a gift and just what my Son wanted. Thank you Amazon for making this purchase so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Richard

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I opened these knives and was impressed at first glance and the sheath was nice. I took the paracord off the handle, I didn't like them, just a personal preference. They are pretty well balanced and I was having fun throwing them. I was using a soft maple target, just about to get on Amazon and leave a five star review and then on my last throw one of the knife handles broke! I have always been a SOG fan and I love my seal pup but the last two SOG products that I have owned have been a huge disappointment. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Great Knives!
customer_reviews.text: I've put these knives through some punishment and they still perform., The wrapped paracord handle feels comfortable in your hand. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Fan of SOG blades
customer_reviews.text: Heavy good for medium distance throwing.. use outdoors. Don't do like I did an throw them indoors. You will mess up your furniture :-(
customer_reviews.author: ris4royal

customer_reviews.title: Good for learning with
customer_reviews.text: Good for learning with, but with the placement of the knot in the paracord wrap makes handle throws difficult. I found that by undoing the knot and gluing it into the slot in the handle worked out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: He and his younger brother have absolutely loved using them
customer_reviews.text: I got these knives for my husband for Christmas. He and his younger brother have absolutely loved using them. Target practice has never been so fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stanley

product_meta.title: SOG Fling Classic Throwing Knives Set with Sheath - 3pk Balanced Throwing Knife Set with 2.8 Inch Steel Blades and Paracord Handles (FX41N-CP), Black, One Size
product_meta.description: Fling 3 Piece Throwing Crafted from the highest quality materials. Built for performance and durability. Made in China
feature_bullets: 3-PACK THROWING BLADES KIT: Perfect practice throwing knives for those who throw often and hard; use as professional throwing knives and get even more value per throw than pricier knife sets.

9.5 INCH FULL-TANG STAINLESS STEEL KNIVES FOR THROWING: More durable than generic throwing weapons and martial arts knives; each knife is crafted heel to butt in stainless steel with 7-foot paracord handle.
TACTICAL THROWING KNIFE CONSTRUCTION: Well-crafted for many professional target throwing styles; no spin, combative rotation, recreational freestyle and more.
MULTI NYLON SHEATH THROWING KNIVES CARRY: Ballistic competition throwing knives sheath; secure all 3 knives with the Velcro strap and attach via belt loop.
SOG KNIVES FOR LIFE: Take care of your throwing knives and we’ll take care of you; we gladly consider repairs and replacements for properly maintained SOG gear.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars452 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
